abstract: Mexico’s top prosecutor reports apprehension of suspect connected to Mexico City murders of Mexican photojournalist Ruben Espinosa, along with his friend Nadia Vera, two of her roommates and their housekeeper; identity of suspect is not released.
lead_paragraph: A fingerprint had linked the suspect to the killing of Rubén Espinosa, his friend Nadia Vera, two of her roommates and their housekeeper.

headline.main: Mexico: Suspect Is Arrested in Deaths of Photojournalist and Four Others
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Mexico: Suspect Is Arrested in Deaths of Photojournalist and Four Others

snippet: A fingerprint had linked the suspect to the killing of Rubén Espinosa, his friend Nadia Vera, two of her roommates and their housekeeper.
